SENT.plain: We report a case of cutaneous alternariosis in a 69-year-old male patient
During hospitalization for treatment of the skin disorder, acute myeloid leukaemia was diagnosed
He received multiple chemotherapeutic agents but the leukaemia remained refractory to therapy and the patient died
The clinical picture, diagnosis and treatment of cutaneous alternariosis will be discussed and a review of the literature regarding patients with haematological diseases will be given
